parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. Generate a value that is unique for each request. The token can contain a maximum of 64 ASCII characters.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en.

parameters.name: RecordId
parameters.description: The ID of the DNS record.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.
